PayGrade.name: PayGrade
PayGrade.description: Represents a range of positions that require sufficiently similar responsibilities and competencies, and are associated with a common pay band.

Code.description: The code for the pay grade.

Description.description: The description of the pay grade.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date when the pay grade is effective.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date when the pay grade is no longer effective.

ExternalReferenceUrl.description: The link to an external source of information about the pay grade.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MaximumSalary.description: The maximum salary for the pay grade.

MinimumSalary.description: The minimum salary for the pay grade.

Name.description: The name of the pay grade.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.
